references.reason: This is a foundational textbook in numerical linear algebra, providing essential background for many Krylov subspace methods.

references.paper_title: GMRES: A generalized minimal residual algorithm for solving nonsymmetric linear systems
references.reason: This paper introduces the GMRES algorithm, a widely used iterative method for solving large sparse non-symmetric linear systems, which is the baseline method compared to in this paper.

references.paper_title: Convergence of restarted Krylov subspaces to invariant subspaces
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical analysis on the convergence of Krylov subspace methods, which is crucial for understanding the acceleration effect of NeurKItt.
This paper introduces the Krylov subspace recycling techniques, which is the foundation for the acceleration module in NeurKItt.

references.paper_title: Fourier neural operator for parametric partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO), the core neural operator used in the subspace prediction module of NeurKItt.
